int32_t Mcasp_localSubmitIoctl (Mcasp_ChannelHandle chanHandle, Uns cmd, void *arg, void *param)
 This function executes the control commands passed by the IDriver, the application passes the control command required to the IDriver uisng the stream control function. The IDriver function then calls this function which then actually executes the control command. More...
 

Detailed Description

This files contains the ioctl functions required for the Mcasp driver to execute the control commands.

(C) Copyright 2019, Texas Instruments, Inc

Version
0.2 Added the support for the non loop job mode 0.1 Newly created.

Function Documentation

int32_t Mcasp_localConfigWordWidth ( Mcasp_ChannelHandle  chanHandle,
Mcasp_ChanParams *  chanParams 
)
static

This function reconfigures the word width of the channel parameters.

Parameters
chanHandle[IN] Handle to the McASP channel
chanParams[IN] Pointer to McASP channel parameters
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED - Successful completion MCASP_EBADARGS - Invalid parameters or Invalid handle
int32_t Mcasp_localSubmitIoctl ( Mcasp_ChannelHandle  chanHandle,
Uns  cmd,
void *  arg,
void *  param 
)

This function executes the control commands passed by the IDriver, the application passes the control command required to the IDriver uisng the stream control function. The IDriver function then calls this function which then actually executes the control command.

Parameters
chanHandle[IN] Handle to channel
cmd[IN] Control command number
arg[IN] Arguments for control command
param[IN] user defined data structure
Returns
Appropriate error code in case of failure else MCASP_COMPLETED is returned
static void mcaspConfigLoopBack ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Bool  loopBack 
)
static

This function sets the digital loopback mode.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] pointer to the Mcasp Hardware information structure
loopBack[IN] Value to be loaded into the bit filed
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED - Successful completion MCASP_EBADARGS - Invalid parameters or Invalid handle
static void mcaspDeviceInfoGet ( Mcasp_ChannelHandle  chanHandle,
void *  arg 
)
static

This function gets the device related information of the mcasp.

Parameters
chanHandle[IN] handle to the channel
arg[IN] pointer to the Mcasp_AudioDevData structure supplied by the application.
Returns
None
static void mcaspGetSerMode ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Mcasp_SerMode *  serMode,
Mcasp_SerializerNum  serNum 
)
static

This function gets the current mode for the serializer requested.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] pointer to the Mcasp Hardware information structure
serMode[IN] Serializer mode will be stored here
serNum[IN] Serailizer number to be checked
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED - Successful completion MCASP_EBADARGS - Invalid parameters or Invalid handle
static void mcaspGetSerRcvReady ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Bool *  serRcvReady,
Mcasp_SerializerNum  serNum 
)
static

This function checks whether receive buffer ready bit of serializer control register is set or not.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] pointer to the Mcasp Hardware information structure
serRcvReady[IN] Serailizer status will be stored here
serNum[IN] Serailizer register to be checked
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED - Successful completion of read MCASP_EBADARGS - Invalid parameters or Invalid handle
static void mcaspGetSerXmtReady ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Bool *  serXmtReady,
Mcasp_SerializerNum  serNum 
)
static

This function checks whether transmit buffer ready bit of serializer control register is set or not.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] pointer to the Mcasp Hardware information structure
serXmtReady[IN] Status of the serializer will be stored here
serNum[IN] serializer number to be checked
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED - Successful completion MCASP_EBADARGS - Invalid parameters or Invalid handle
static void mcaspReadRcvConfig ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Mcasp_HwSetupData *const  rcvData 
)
static

mcaspReadRcvConfig

Reads the configuration data of the receive section and updates the info to the pointer provided by the application.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] Handle to mcasp hw information structure
rcvData[OUT] pointer to copy the data to
Returns
Nothing
static void mcaspReadXmtConfig ( Mcasp_HwHandle  hMcasp,
Mcasp_HwSetupData *const  xmtData 
)
static

mcaspReadXmtConfig

Reads the configuration data of the transmit section and updates the info to the pointer provided by the application.

Parameters
hMcasp[IN] Handle to mcasp hw information structure
xmtData[OUT] pointer to copy the data from
Returns
Nothing
static int32_t mcaspSetSamplingRate ( Mcasp_ChannelHandle  chanHandle,
void *  ioctlArg 
)
static

This function configures the sample rate for the Mcasp.

Parameters
chanHandle[IN] handle to the channel
ioctlArg[IN] Pointer to the IOCTL arguments
Returns
MCASP_COMPLETED if success or else error code
